name: UShort
desc: Ushort is a lightweight URL shortener built with Node.js and MongoDB, offering fast redirects, link analytics, and a simple UI for managing and sharing links with ease
longdesc: Ushort is a lightweight URL shortener built with Node.js and MongoDB, offering fast redirects, link analytics, and a simple UI for managing and sharing links with ease. It allows users to create short links that redirect to long URLs, track link performance, and manage their links easily. The application is designed to be user-friendly and efficient, making it ideal for both personal and professional use.
